mapper.insert: insert into cbc_ab_request ( ab_transaction_id, node_uuid, version_label) values ( #{transactionId}, #{nodeId}, #{versionLabel})

insert into cbc_ab_response ( ab_transaction_id, request_type, document_id, save_number, registration_number) values ( #{transactionId}, #{requestType}, #{documentID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saveNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT cbc_ab_request.node_uuid nodeId, cbc_ab_request.version_label versionLabel, cbc_ab_request.ab_transaction_id transactionId, cbc_ab_response.request_type requestType, cbc_ab_response.document_id documentId, cbc_ab_response.save_number saveNumber, cbc_ab_response.registration_number registrationNumber FROM cbc_ab_response, cbc_ab_request WHERE cbc_ab_request.ab_transaction_id= cbc_ab_response.ab_transaction_id
